Html:
Hallo,

What is the best way to pass URL parameters to the module?
The idea is that the user calles my Silverligh application and passes serveral paramters eg.:  applicationURL?entityname=customer&mode=singel

I roughly know how to pass the parameter from my aspx page to the app.xaml. But how do I publish the stated parameter to my modules?


Iam thankfull for any help.
